short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple new tab extension with a slide clock that does not require any permissions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A beautiful New Tab page with Slide Clock. A simple design that is not crowded is intended. The background changes according to the time of day. Nothing unnecessary has been added. It works completely offline. It is prepared for low power consumption. Recommended for those who use the default bookmarks bar and want simplicity in their browser.
